automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_80pct_evening'
alias: Living Room 80% Between 6 PM and 11 PM
description: "Turn on Living Room light to 80% at 18:00 and turn off at 23:00 daily"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '18:00:00'
    id: start
  - platform: time
    at: '23:00:00'
    id: end
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: trigger
            id: start
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness_pct: 80
      - conditions:
          - condition: trigger
            id: end
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
